publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-542 Pauline McNeill: Maggie's Centre Glasgow - First Birthday-That the Parliament congratulates the Glasgow Maggie's Centre on its successful first year of operation; notes the wonderful transformation of the derelict Gatehouse building at the Western Infirmary and Glasgow University into the welcoming and modern centre made possible by funds raised by many individuals; welcomes the free drop-in counselling service that Maggie's Centres offer to individuals with cancer and their families and friends as well as providing emotional support, practical information, fellowship and relaxation courses; notes that in its first year of operation the Glasgow Maggie's Centre has made a difference to the lives of more than 3,000 individuals, and considers that Maggie's Centres make an important contribution to the treatment and aftercare of cancer patients and their families.
